verses.verse: Now the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Yissakhar <S%H3485><s%> were, Tola <S%H8439><s%>, and Puah <S%H6312><s%>, Jashub <S%H3437><s%>, and Shimron <S%H8110><s%>, four <S%H702><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Tola <S%H8439><s%>; Uzzi <S%H5813><s%>, and Rephaiah <S%H7509><s%>, and Jeriel <S%H3400><s%>, and YAHmai <S%H3181><s%>, and Jibsam <S%H3005><s%>, and Shemuel <S%H8050><s%>, heads <S%H7218><s%> of their father's <S%H1><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>, to wit, of Tola <S%H8439><s%>: they were valiant men <S%H1368><s%> of might <S%H2428><s%> in their generations <S%H8435><s%>; whose number <S%H4557><s%> was in the days <S%H3117><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Uzzi <S%H5813><s%>; Izrahiah <S%H3156><s%>: and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Izrahiah <S%H3156><s%>; Mikha'el <S%H4317><s%>, and `Ovadyah-yahu <S%H5662><s%>, and Joel <S%H3100><s%>, Ishiah <S%H3449><s%>, five <S%H2568><s%>: all of them chief men <S%H7218><s%>.

And with them, by their generations <S%H8435><s%>, after the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>, were bands <S%H1416><s%> of soldiers <S%H6635><s%> for war <S%H4421><s%>, six <S%H8337><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men: for they had many <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8689><s%> wives <S%H802><s%> and sons <S%H1121><s%>.

And their brethren <S%H251><s%> among all the families <S%H4940><s%> of Yissakhar <S%H3485><s%> were valiant <S%H1368><s%> men of might <S%H2428><s%>, reckoned in all by their genealogies <S%H3187><s%> <S%H8692><s%> fourscore <S%H8084><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>.
The sons of Binyamin <S%H1144><s%>; Bela <S%H1106><s%>, and Becher <S%H1071><s%>, and Jediael <S%H3043><s%>, three <S%H7969><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Bela <S%H1106><s%>; Ezbon <S%H675><s%>, and Uzzi <S%H5813><s%>, and Uzziel <S%H5816><s%>, and Jerimoth <S%H3406><s%>, and Iri <S%H5901><s%>, five <S%H2568><s%>; heads <S%H7218><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>, mighty <S%H1368><s%> men of valour <S%H2428><s%>; and were reckoned by their genealogies <S%H3187><s%> <S%H8692><s%> twenty <S%H6242><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%> and four <S%H702><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Becher <S%H1071><s%>; Zemira <S%H2160><s%>, and Yo'ash <S%H3135><s%>, and Eliezer <S%H461><s%>, and Elioenai <S%H454><s%>, and Omri <S%H6018><s%>, and Jerimoth <S%H3406><s%>, and Abiah <S%H29><s%>, and Anathoth <S%H6068><s%>, and Alameth <S%H5964><s%>. All these are the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Becher <S%H1071><s%>.

And the number <S%H3187><s%> <S%H8692><s%> of them, after their genealogy by their generations <S%H8435><s%>, heads <S%H7218><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>, mighty men <S%H1368><s%> of valour <S%H2428><s%>, was twenty <S%H6242><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and two hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

The sons <S%H1121><s%> also of Jediael <S%H3043><s%>; Bilhan <S%H1092><s%>: and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Bilhan <S%H1092><s%>; Jeush <S%H3274><s%>, and Binyamin <S%H1144><s%>, and Ehud <S%H164><s%>, and Chenaanah <S%H3668><s%>, and Zethan <S%H2133><s%>, and Tharshish <S%H8659><s%>, and Ahishahar <S%H300><s%>.

All these the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jediael <S%H3043><s%>, by the heads <S%H7218><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>, mighty <S%H1368><s%> men of valour <S%H2428><s%>, were seventeen <S%H7651><s%> <S%H6240><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and two hundred <S%H3967><s%> soldiers, fit to go out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8802><s%> for war <S%H6635><s%> and battle <S%H4421><s%>.
Shuppim <S%H8206><s%> also, and Huppim <S%H2650><s%>, the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ir <S%H5893><s%>, and Hushim <S%H2366><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aher <S%H313><s%>.
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Naftali <S%H5321><s%>; YAHziel <S%H3185><s%>, and Guni <S%H1476><s%>, and Jezer <S%H3337><s%>, and Shallum <S%H7967><s%>, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Bilhah <S%H1090><s%>.

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%>; Ashriel <S%H844><s%>, whom she bare <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: ( but his concubine <S%H6370><s%> the Aramitess <S%H761><s%> bare <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Machir <S%H4353><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Gil`ad <S%H1568><s%>:

And Machir <S%H4353><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to wife <S%H802><s%> the sister of Huppim <S%H2650><s%> and Shuppim <S%H8206><s%>, whose sister's <S%H269><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> was Maachah <S%H4601><s%>;) and the name <S%H8034><s%> of the second <S%H8145><s%> was TZ'lof'chad <S%H6765><s%>: and TZ'lof'chad <S%H6765><s%> had daughters <S%H1323><s%>.

And Maachah <S%H4601><s%> the wife <S%H802><s%> of Machir <S%H4353><s%> bare <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%>, and she called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Peresh <S%H6570><s%>; and the name <S%H8034><s%> of his brother <S%H251><s%> was Sheresh <S%H8329><s%>; and his sons <S%H1121><s%> were Ulam <S%H198><s%> and Rakem <S%H7552><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ulam <S%H198><s%>; Bedan <S%H917><s%>. These were the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gil`ad <S%H1568><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Machir <S%H4353><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%>.
And his sister <S%H269><s%> Hammoleketh <S%H4447><s%> bare <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Ishod <S%H379><s%>, and Abiezer <S%H44><s%>, and Mahalah <S%H4244><s%>.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shemida <S%H8061><s%> were, Ahian <S%H291><s%>, and SH'khem <S%H7928><s%>, and Likhi <S%H3949><s%>, and Aniam <S%H593><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Efrayim <S%H669><s%>; Shuthelah <S%H7803><s%>, and Bered <S%H1260><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, and Tahath <S%H8480><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, and Eladah <S%H497><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, and Tahath <S%H8480><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>,

And Zabad <S%H2066><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, and Shuthelah <S%H7803><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, and Ezer <S%H5827><s%>, and Elead <S%H496><s%>, whom the men <S%H582><s%> of Gat <S%H1661><s%> that were born <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8737><s%> in that land <S%H776><s%> slew <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, because they came down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to take away <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8800><s%> their cattle <S%H4735><s%>.

And Efrayim <S%H669><s%> their father <S%H1><s%> mourned <S%H56><s%> <S%H8691><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, and his brethren <S%H251><s%> came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to comfort <S%H5162><s%> <S%H8763><s%> him.

And when he went in <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to his wife <S%H802><s%>, she conceived <S%H2029><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and bare <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a son <S%H1121><s%>, and he called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his name <S%H8034><s%> Beriah <S%H1283><s%>, because it went evil <S%H7451><s%> with his house <S%H1004><s%>.

(And his daughter <S%H1323><s%> was Sherah <S%H7609><s%>, who built <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Bethhoron <S%H1032><s%> the nether <S%H8481><s%>, and the upper <S%H5945><s%>, and Uzzensherah <S%H242><s%>.)
And Rephah <S%H7506><s%> was his son <S%H1121><s%>, also Resheph <S%H7566><s%>, and Telah <S%H8520><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, and Tahan <S%H8465><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>,
Laadan <S%H3936><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Ammihud <S%H5989><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Elishama <S%H476><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>,
Non <S%H5126><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Jehoshua <S%H3091><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>.

And their possessions <S%H272><s%> and habitations <S%H4186><s%> were, Beit-El <S%H1008><s%> and the towns <S%H1323><s%> thereof, and eastward <S%H4217><s%> Naaran <S%H5295><s%>, and westward <S%H4628><s%> Gezer <S%H1507><s%>, with the towns <S%H1323><s%> thereof; SH'khem <S%H7927><s%> also and the towns <S%H1323><s%> thereof, unto Gaza <S%H5804><s%> and the towns <S%H1323><s%> thereof:

And by the borders <S%H3027><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of M'nasheh <S%H4519><s%>, Bethshean <S%H1052><s%> and her towns <S%H1323><s%>, Taanach <S%H8590><s%> and her towns <S%H1323><s%>, Megiddo <S%H4023><s%> and her towns <S%H1323><s%>, Dor <S%H1756><s%> and her towns <S%H1323><s%>. In these dwelt <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yosef <S%H3130><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Asher <S%H836><s%>; Imnah <S%H3232><s%>, and Isuah <S%H3438><s%>, and Ishuai <S%H3440><s%>, and Beriah <S%H1283><s%>, and Serah <S%H8294><s%> their sister <S%H269><s%>.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Beriah <S%H1283><s%>; Heber <S%H2268><s%>, and Malchiel <S%H4439><s%>, who is the father <S%H1><s%> of Birzavith <S%H1269><s%>.
And Heber <S%H2268><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8689><s%> Japhlet <S%H3310><s%>, and Shomer <S%H7763><s%>, and Hotham <S%H2369><s%>, and Shua <S%H7774><s%> their sister <S%H269><s%>.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Japhlet <S%H3310><s%>; Pasach <S%H6457><s%>, and Bimhal <S%H1118><s%>, and Ashvath <S%H6220><s%>. These are the children <S%H1121><s%> of Japhlet <S%H3310><s%>.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shamer <S%H8106><s%>; Ahi <S%H277><s%>, and Rohgah <S%H7303><s%>, Yehubbah <S%H3160><s%>, and Aram <S%H758><s%>.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of his brother <S%H251><s%> Helem <S%H1987><s%>; Zophah <S%H6690><s%>, and Imna <S%H3234><s%>, and Shelesh <S%H8028><s%>, and Amal <S%H6000><s%>.
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zophah <S%H6690><s%>; Suah <S%H5477><s%>, and Harnepher <S%H2774><s%>, and Shual <S%H7777><s%>, and Beri <S%H1275><s%>, and Imrah <S%H3236><s%>,
Bezer <S%H1221><s%>, and Hod <S%H1936><s%>, and Shamma <S%H8037><s%>, and Shilshah <S%H8030><s%>, and Ithran <S%H3506><s%>, and Beera <S%H878><s%>.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jether <S%H3500><s%>; Y'funeh <S%H3312><s%>, and Pispah <S%H6462><s%>, and Ara <S%H690><s%>.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ulla <S%H5925><s%>; Arah <S%H733><s%>, and Haniel <S%H2592><s%>, and Rezia <S%H7525><s%>.

All these were the children <S%H1121><s%> of Asher <S%H836><s%>, heads <S%H7218><s%> of their father's <S%H1><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>, choice <S%H1305><s%> <S%H8803><s%> and mighty men <S%H1368><s%> of valour <S%H2428><s%>, chief <S%H7218><s%> of the princes <S%H5387><s%>. And the number <S%H4557><s%> throughout the genealogy <S%H3187><s%> <S%H8692><s%> of them that were apt to the war <S%H6635><s%> and to battle <S%H4421><s%> was twenty <S%H6242><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> men <S%H582><s%>.
